page.title: 17LIVING IN CLATFORD
page.content: When doing a study on whether people like living in Clatford, we asked if they liked living here and two-thirds said they did one-sixth said no,one-sixth said it was alright. There are{DISADVANTAGES}and advantages to living in the village.{ {LIFESTYLES} are peaceful and quiet, not like a town or city.but some children said there are no fairgrounds and not many activities.The adults like living in the village but there is not a very good {BUS SERVICE }to get to town if you don't drive. On Thursday there is a free bus that will take you into town and back. The family of{DOWLING}have lived in Goodworth Clatford since 1538 and has continued here until the present day.Unfortunately the name will now die out though the grandson Lee Belbin attends the local school.
